comment.author: 32804642@N03
comment._content: French racer, he manufactured his own 500 cc motorcycle in 1914 which finished first in the "circuit du Sud Ouest " (France-1914).

comment.author: 32804642@N03
comment._content: Rode a strange Alcyon-Anzani motorcycle with a 3-cylinders. He killed accidently a policeman during a 1914 race but was one of the best racer on his time.
